accountDeletion.title: Account & Data Deletion Request
accountDeletion.intro: This page explains how users of <1>{{app}}</1> (developer: <3>{{developer}}</3>) can request deletion of their account and associated data.
accountDeletion.step1: Send an email to <1>support@sportime.com</1> from the email address associated with your account.
accountDeletion.step2: Include your full name and any relevant account information to help us identify your account.
accountDeletion.step3: State clearly that you wish to delete your account and all associated data.
accountDeletion.data3: Any other personal data associated with your account
accountDeletion.retentionDesc: All personal data will be permanently deleted within 30 days of your request. Some non-personal or anonymized data may be retained for legal or analytical purposes, as required by law.
accountDeletion.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us at <1>{{email}}</1>.
